array.string: Crunches
1. Lay on back with knees bent and facing sky 2. Roll up so that top of head is facing sky and back is close to straight 3. Roll back down so that back is flat on ground
Flutter Kicks
1. Lay flat on back 2. Lift feet slightly off ground 3. Move feet up and down opposite of one another
Penguins

1. Lay on back with knees bent and facing sky 2. Curl up so that shoulder blades are of ground 3. Extend arms straight along side of body 4. Touch left hand to left heal then right hand to right heal and repeat
Plank
1. Place hands and feet on ground 2. Hands are shoulder length apart, back is straight, knees are straight 3. Hold
Side Plank
1. Place one hand on ground 2. Stack feet on top of each other 3. Shift weight to hand and open to the side
Scissor Kicks
1. Lay flat on back 2. Lift feet slightly off ground 3. Move feet left and right opposite of one another
Toe Touches
1. Lay on back with legs perpendicular to the ground and bottoms of feet facing sky 2. Lift shoulder blades off ground and touch hands to toes 3. Lower back down
Leg Lifts
1. Lay flat on back 2. Lift feet slightly off ground 3. Lift legs perpendicular to ground 4. Lower legs to a few inches above ground
Bicycles
1. Put hands behind head 2. Extend legs so that feet are hovering slightly above ground 3. Bend one knee and touch the opposite elbow to that knee 4. Switch
Leg Extentions
1. Put hands behind head 2. Move knees to make a 90 degree angle with feet off ground and shins parallel to ground 3. Extend one leg straight and hovering just off the ground 4. Switch
Rainbow Plank
1. Begin in a plank position 2. Touch one hip to the ground 3. Make a rainbow shape with your hips to touch the other hip to the ground
Boat Hold
1. Make a V with body by balancing on tailbone 2. Hold with straight back
Rowers
1. Make a V with body by balancing on tailbone 2. Extend feet outward while leaning slightly backwards 3. Return to original V shape
Super Crunches
1. Make a V with body by balancing on tailbone 2. Extend feet outward to hover just over ground while leaning backwards so back is hovering just over ground 3. Return to original V shape
Full Crunches

1. Put hands behind head 2. Move knees to make a 90 degree angle with feet off ground and shins parallel to ground 3. Lift shoulder blades off ground, lift tailbone off ground at same time 4. Lower shoulder blades and tailbone back to ground
Dead Bugs

1. Begin on back 2. Move knees to make a 90 degree angle with feet off ground and shins parallel to ground, extend arms perpendicular to ground 3. Extend one leg straight to hover over ground, lower opposite arm to ground overhead 4. Return to original position, repeat with other side
Side Crunch Roll-ups
1. Begin in fetal position on one side 2. Without using arms roll over onto tailbone 3. Sit up 4. Return to fetal position without using arms
Side Sit-ups
1. Begin in fetal position on one side 2. Lift bottom shoulder off ground by contracting oblique muscles 3. Return to original position
Alternating Cross Sit-ups

1. Lay on back with knees bent and facing sky 2. Roll up so that top of head is facing sky and back is close to straight 3. Rotate opposite elbow to opposite knee 4. Roll back down so that back is flat on ground, repeat with other side
